tooltips.name: tt_loss_array_spacing
tooltips.title: Array Spacing Loss
tooltips.tip: Losses associated with interactions of wave energy converters due to spacing.

tooltips.name: tt_loss_resource_overprediction
tooltips.title: Resource Overprediction Loss
tooltips.tip:
Reduction from resource uncertainty associated 
with installing device waters at a depth or distance 
outside parameters of resource file (e.g. shallow 
waters close to shore, large distance from 
measuring buoy).

tooltips.name: tt_loss_transmission
tooltips.title: Transmission Losses
tooltips.tip:
Related to the efficiency of the electrical 
infrastructure for the array, such as inter-device 
cabling, export cabling, substations, and onshore 
transmission up to grid interconnection.

tooltips.name: tt_loss_downtime
tooltips.title: Array/WEC Downtime Loss
tooltips.tip:
Availability losses which reduce the system output 
during system outages, operations and maintenance 
activities, or other events.

tooltips.name: tt_loss_additional
tooltips.title: Additional Losses
tooltips.tip:
Miscellaneous losses which would decrease the 
power output from the wave energy converter to 
the grid.

tooltips.name: tt_structural_assembly_cost
tooltips.title: Structural Assembly
tooltips.tip:
Primary energy capture and supporting structural 
components. Cost includes prime mover (float paddle, 
turbine, flap, etc.), ancillary marine systems, 
coatings, transportation of structure to staging area, and 
additional structural components.

tooltips.name: tt_power_takeoff_system_cost
tooltips.title: Power Take-Off System (PTO)
tooltips.tip:
Comprised of mechanism to convert captured energy 
into mechanical power, such as hydraulic drivetrain, 
gearbox (speed increaser/reducer), air turbine, or 
electrical generator. Cost also includes PTO enclosure, coatings, 
transportation to staging area, power electronics, and short-term 
energy storage.

tooltips.name: tt_mooring_found_substruc_cost
tooltips.title: Mooring, Foundation, and Sub-Structure
tooltips.tip:
All elements of the mooring system and/or 
foundation. Elements include mooring lines, anchors, 
piles, connecting hardware, scour protection, additional 
non-structural elements, and transportation of components to 
staging area.

tooltips.name: tt_development_cost
tooltips.title: Development
tooltips.tip:
All activities from project inception to financial close. Activities such
as site selection, permitting and leasing, professional advisory services,
initial engineering, site characterization, interconnection and power
marketing, and development project management.

tooltips.name: tt_eng_and_mgmt_cost
tooltips.title: Engineering and Management
tooltips.tip:
Costs include detailed designs, procurement management, construction
management, project certification, and health/safety/environmental
monitoring. All engineering and management activities from financial close 
through commercial operation date.

tooltips.name: tt_plant_commissioning_cost
tooltips.title: Plant Commissioning
tooltips.tip:
Cost incurred by owner or prime contractor
to test and commission the integrated power plant.
Modeled value is 1.6% of capital expenditures.

tooltips.name: tt_site_access_port_staging_cost
tooltips.title: Site Access, Port & Staging
tooltips.tip:
Activities and physical aspects needed to support 
portside  delivery, storage, handling, and deployment 
of marine energy converter components. Costs include 
port facilities lease, cranage fees, port improvements, 
and port fees. Modeled value is 1.1% of capital expenditures.

tooltips.name: tt_assembly_and_install_cost
tooltips.title: Assembly & Installation
tooltips.tip:
Costs associated with vessels, labor, and equipment costs for
assembly and installation of substructures/foundations,
marine energy converter, offshore electrical infrastructure,
and offshore logistical infrastructure. All assembly and
installation activities conducted at the staging port and
at the project site.

tooltips.name: tt_other_infrastructure_cost
tooltips.title: Other Infrastructure
tooltips.tip:
Other capital investments made by the project 
company prior to commercial operation date, such 
as offshore accommodations, dedicated O&M vessels, onshore 
O&M facilities, and offshore logistical infrastructure.

tooltips.name: tt_array_cable_system_cost
tooltips.title: Array Cable
tooltips.tip:
Low to medium voltage cables which connect the marine 
energy converters with offshore substation or export cable.

tooltips.name: tt_export_cable_system_cost
tooltips.title: Export Cable
tooltips.tip:
Medium to high voltage cable to connect marine energy converter 
or offshore substations with onshore electric infrastructure.

tooltips.name: tt_onshore_substation_cost
tooltips.title: Onshore Substation
tooltips.tip:
Facility to house electric conversion equipment to transform or 
convert power from the export voltage to the onshore grid voltage.

tooltips.name: tt_offshore_substation_cost
tooltips.title: Offshore Substation
tooltips.tip:
Electric conversion equipment required to step-up or convert 
power for export to the onshore grid and support structure. 
Cost includes onboard work platforms, accommodation, 
equipment storage, or helicopter access.

tooltips.name: tt_other_elec_infra_cost
tooltips.title: Other Electrical Infrastructure
tooltips.tip:
Costs include cable accessories and jointing, cable 
for protection, cable commissioning, and cable transportation. Any 
cost associated with components for electrical infrastructure 
not called out in SAM.

tooltips.name: tt_project_contingency_cost
tooltips.title: Project Contingency Cost
tooltips.tip:
Modeled value is 5% of capital expenditures. Liquid 
financial instrument set up to respond to "known unknown" 
costs that arise during construction, does not include contingences 
set by manufacturers and contractors as part of supply 
contract pricing.

tooltips.name: tt_insurance_during_construction_cost
tooltips.title: Cost of Insurance During Construction
tooltips.tip:
Modeled value is 1% of capital expenditures. Insurance policies 
held by owner during construction period. Costs may 
include construction all risk, marine cargo, commercial general liability, 
workers compensation, environmental site liability, 
pollution liability, etc. Does not 
include insurance held by contractors.

tooltips.name: tt_reserve_accounts_cost
tooltips.title: Reserve Account Costs
tooltips.tip:
Modeled value is 3% of capital expenditures. Payments 
(before commissioning) into reserve accounts. Generally 
required by either financiers or regulators.

tooltips.name: tt_operations_cost_cost
tooltips.title: Operations
tooltips.tip:
Non-equipment costs during project operations. Costs 
include insurance, annual seabed and onshore leases, 
personnel salaries, software, facilities during operations, and 
environmental/health/safety monitoring.

tooltips.name: tt_maintenance_cost_cost
tooltips.title: Maintenance
tooltips.tip:
Maintenance performed under long-term service agreements, 
scheduled or unscheduled maintenance. Costs include vessel, 
labor, and equipment costs of operations for the project.

tooltips.name: tt_prime_mover_cost
tooltips.title: Prime Mover
tooltips.tip: Primary body used for energy capture (e.g. WEC float, Rotor, flap, etc.).

tooltips.name: tt_structural_component_cost
tooltips.title: Structural Components
tooltips.tip: Any additional supporting structural components not included in the Structure category.

tooltips.name: tt_marine_systems_cost
tooltips.title: Marine Systems
tooltips.tip: Ancillary systems on the marine energy converter (MEC) device.

tooltips.name: tt_coatings_cost
tooltips.title: Coatings
tooltips.tip: Coatings to protect from corrosion in marine environment.

tooltips.name: tt_transportation_of_structure_cost
tooltips.title: Transportation of Structure
tooltips.tip: Costs of transporting the marine energy converter (MEC) structure components from the manufacturing facility to the staging area.

tooltips.name: tt_other_structural_assembly_cost
tooltips.title: Other Structural Assembly Costs
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the structural assembly categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_hydraulic_drivetrain_cost
tooltips.title: Hydraulic Drivetrain
tooltips.tip: Hydraulic system to transfer mechanical energy from marine energy converter to electrical energy.

tooltips.name: tt_gearbox_cost
tooltips.title: Gearbox
tooltips.tip: Mechanical system used to increase or decrease the speed of the shaft work going into the generator. This may include mechanical motion rectifiers

tooltips.name: tt_air_turbine_cost
tooltips.title: Air Turbine
tooltips.tip: Any turbine that is used to convert kinetic energy in the air, due to wave oscillations, into shaft work (e.g. Wells Turbine)

tooltips.name: tt_electrical_generator_cost
tooltips.title: Electrical Generator
tooltips.tip: Any Generator that is used to convert rotational shaft work, or translational motion into electrical power.

tooltips.name: tt_short_term_energy_storage_cost
tooltips.title: Short-term Energy Storage
tooltips.tip: Temporary storage of electrical energy (e.g. onboard batteries or ultra-capacitors for wave to wave power smoothing)

tooltips.name: tt_power_electronics_cost
tooltips.title: Power Electronics
tooltips.tip: Electrical system used to transfer power, convert voltages or frequencies, as well as any active power controllers.

tooltips.name: tt_power_takeoff_enclosure_cost
tooltips.title: Power Take-off Enclosure
tooltips.tip: Any enclosure used to house or isolate the Power Take-Off system (e.g. Nacelle)

tooltips.name: tt_coatings_pto_cost
tooltips.title: Coatings
tooltips.tip: Coatings to protect from corrosion in marine environment.

tooltips.name: tt_transportation_of_power_conversion_chain_cost
tooltips.title: Transportation of Power Conversion Chain
tooltips.tip: Costs of transporting the marine energy converter (MEC) power conversion chain (PCC) components from the manufacturing facility to the staging area.

tooltips.name: tt_other_pto_cost
tooltips.title: Other PTO Costs
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the PTO categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_mooring_lines_cost
tooltips.title: Mooring Lines
tooltips.tip: Chain, wire, or synthetic fiber ropes to connect marine energy converter with anchors on the seabed.

tooltips.name: tt_anchors_and_piles_cost
tooltips.title: Anchors and Piles
tooltips.tip: Anchors and Piles installed on the seabed to either maintain station keeping or to react against the seabed. This can include gravity based anchor systems.

tooltips.name: tt_connecting_hardware_cost
tooltips.title: Connecting Hardware
tooltips.tip: Connectors required to attach the mooring lines to anchors and marine energy converter.

tooltips.name: tt_subfoundation_or_bedding_cost
tooltips.title: Sub-foundation or Bedding
tooltips.tip: Layers of gravel and stone to provide a stable and level surface on which to place anchors.

tooltips.name: tt_messenger_lines_and_buoys_cost
tooltips.title: Messenger Lines and Buoys
tooltips.tip: Ancillary equipment used during the installation of the mooring system.

tooltips.name: tt_scour_protection_cost
tooltips.title: Scour Protection
tooltips.tip: Rock fill or concrete mattresses to protect substructures from scouring (caused by currents or waves).

tooltips.name: tt_outfitting_structure_cost
tooltips.title: Outfitting Structure
tooltips.tip: Additional non-structural elements attached to substructure elements.

tooltips.name: tt_ancillary_marine_systems_cost
tooltips.title: Ancillary Marine Systems
tooltips.tip: Ancillary systems required for marine operations.

tooltips.name: tt_integration_assembly_testing_checkout_cost
tooltips.title: Integration, Assembly, Testing, Checkout
tooltips.tip: Activities performed by manufacturer to integrate, assemble, test, and checkout for the mooring and foundation system before  delivery to customer. Does not include commissioning activities.

tooltips.name: tt_transportation_cost
tooltips.title: Transportation
tooltips.tip: Costs of transporting the mooring system components from the manufacturing facility to the staging area.

tooltips.name: tt_other_mooring_substructure_cost
tooltips.title: Other Mooring Substructure Cost
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the mooring, foundation, and sub-structure categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_site_selection_cost
tooltips.title: Site Selection
tooltips.tip: Initial desktop-level studies to select project location, develop a conceptual design, identify regulatory requirements, and create preliminary business case.

tooltips.name: tt_permitting_and_leasing_cost
tooltips.title: Permitting and Leasing
tooltips.tip: Acquisition of permits and leases required for site assessment, construction, and operation at the project site.

tooltips.name: tt_professional_advisory_services_cost
tooltips.title: Professional Advisory Serivces
tooltips.tip: Legal support, external consultants, accounting, etc., during development.

tooltips.name: tt_initial_engineering_cost
tooltips.title: Initial Engineering
tooltips.tip: Engineering studies to specify the design of the project (e.g., technology, layout) and understand economics and risks associated with the design.

tooltips.name: tt_site_characterization_cost
tooltips.title: Site Characterization
tooltips.tip: Equipment, material and labor costs required for collecting/analysis of wind resource, ocean conditions, and geological data at project site. Defines parameters for engineering assessments as data becomes available.

tooltips.name: tt_interconnection_and_power_marketing_cost
tooltips.title: Interconnection and Power Marketing
tooltips.tip: Activities to gain access to the transmission grid and negotiate contracts to sell or otherwise market  power.

tooltips.name: tt_project_management_during_development_cost
tooltips.title: Project Management during Development
tooltips.tip: Project Management from the start of the development phase through financial close.

tooltips.name: tt_financing_and_incentives_cost
tooltips.title: Financing and Incentives
tooltips.tip: Fees, closing costs, and staff and consultant efforts to arrange and secure equity, debt financing, and government incentives.

tooltips.name: tt_other_development_cost
tooltips.title: Other Development
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the development categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_detailed_design_and_construction_engineering_cost
tooltips.title: Detailed Design and Construction Engineering
tooltips.tip: Detailed design and construction engineering costs.

tooltips.name: tt_procurement_management_cost
tooltips.title: Procurement Management
tooltips.tip: Bid management, purchasing, negotiations, contract management.

tooltips.name: tt_construction_management_cost
tooltips.title: Construction Management
tooltips.tip: Quality control and assurance.

tooltips.name: tt_project_certification_cost
tooltips.title: Project Certification
tooltips.tip: Review by a 3rd party independent verification agent to assure that project is in compliance with design basis as well as technical standards and regulatory requirements. Results in project certificate.

tooltips.name: tt_health_safety_and_environmental_monitoring_cost
tooltips.title: Health, Safety, and Environmental Monitoring
tooltips.tip: Coordination and monitoring to ensure compliance with health, safety, and environmental monitoring requirements during construction.

tooltips.name: tt_other_engineering_and_management_cost
tooltips.title: Other Engineering and Management
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the engineering and management categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_array_cable_system_cost
tooltips.title: Array Cable System
tooltips.tip: Collects power generated by the marine energy converter(s) and transports to the offshore substation(s).

tooltips.name: tt_export_cable_systems_cost
tooltips.title: Export Cable Systems
tooltips.tip: Export cables and associated infrastructure to connect marine energy converter(s) or offshore substation(s) with onshore electric infrastructure or offshore convertor station(s) if using direct current (DC).

tooltips.name: tt_cable_protection_cost
tooltips.title: Cable Protection
tooltips.tip: Equipment and materials used to protect cable from damage (strikes, over-bending, etc.)

tooltips.name: tt_offshore_substation_cost
tooltips.title: Offshore Substation
tooltips.tip: Electric conversion equipment required to step-up or convert power for export to the onshore grid and support structure,  also onboard work platforms, accommodation, equipment storage, helicopter access, etc.

tooltips.name: tt_onshore_transmission_infrastructure_cost
tooltips.title: Onshore Transmission Infrastructure
tooltips.tip: Any onshore transmission or conversion equipment required to connect project to onshore grid.

tooltips.name: tt_other_electrical_infrastructure_cost
tooltips.title: Other Electrical Infrastructure
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the electrical Infrastructure categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_staging_port_cost
tooltips.title: Staging Port
tooltips.tip: Port facilities or space leased to support the installation of the project.

tooltips.name: tt_cranage_cost
tooltips.title: Cranage
tooltips.tip: Cranage fees to use and operate crawler cranes, tower cranes, harbor cranes, self-propelled modular transporters (SPMTs) used for land-based assembly of components and load out onto installation vessels.

tooltips.name: tt_port_improvement_cost
tooltips.title: Port Improvements
tooltips.tip: Any improvement to existing port infrastructure paid for by project owner (e.g., quayside reinforcement).

tooltips.name: tt_port_fees_cost
tooltips.title: Port Fees
tooltips.tip: Fees for vessel access, docking and loading/unloading.

tooltips.name: tt_other_site_access_cost
tooltips.title: Other Site Access
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the site access, port, and staging categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_substructures_and_foundations_cost
tooltips.title: Substructures and Foundations
tooltips.tip: Vessel, labor, and equipment costs to complete installation of foundations and substructures.

tooltips.name: tt_marine_energy_converter_device_cost
tooltips.title: Marine Energy Converter Device
tooltips.tip: Vessel, labor, and equipment costs to complete marine energy converter installation procedures for the entire project.

tooltips.name: tt_offshore_electrical_infrastructure_cost
tooltips.title: Offshore Electrical Infrastructure
tooltips.tip: Vessel, labor, and equipment costs to install electrical infrastructure.

tooltips.name: tt_offshore_logistical_infrastructure_cost
tooltips.title: Offshore Logistical Infrastructure
tooltips.tip: Labor and Equipment cost to install offshore logistical infrastructure.

tooltips.name: tt_other_assembly_and_installation_cost
tooltips.title: Other Assembly and Installation
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the assembly and installation categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_offshore_accomodations_cost
tooltips.title: Offshore Accomodations
tooltips.tip: Hotel Vessels or permanent platform(s) at the project site to house project personnel during operations.

tooltips.name: tt_dedicated_om_vessel_cost
tooltips.title: Dedicated O&M Vessel
tooltips.tip: New build vessels owned by the project company that will be used exclusively to support operations at project.

tooltips.name: tt_onshore_om_facilities_cost
tooltips.title: Onshore O&M Facilities
tooltips.tip: Facilities on land, owned by the project company, to support the operation of the project.

tooltips.name: tt_om_equipment_purchases_cost
tooltips.title: O&M Equipment Purchases
tooltips.tip: Other purchases necessary for the operation of the marine energy converter project after commercial operation date (COD). Examples include: safety equipment (e.g., harnesses, floatation devices), equipment to store replacement parts (e.g., climate control for spare electric cables), vehicles to support operations (e.g., fork trucks).

tooltips.name: tt_offshore_logistical_infrastructure_cost
tooltips.title: Offshore Logistical Infrastructure
tooltips.tip: Systems to support marine coordination, weather forecasting, and metocean data collection. May include marine management software, wave buoy, current meter, etc..

tooltips.name: tt_other_infrastructure_transportation_cost
tooltips.title: Other Infrastructure Transportation
tooltips.tip: Cost of transporting other infrastructure components from the manufacturing facility to the staging area.

tooltips.name: tt_other_other_infrastructure_cost
tooltips.title: Other
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the other infrastructure categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_project_contingency_budget_cost
tooltips.title: Project Contingency Budget
tooltips.tip: Liquid financial instrument set up to respond to 'known unknown' costs that arise during construction, does not include contingences set by manufactures and contractors as part of supply contract pricing.

tooltips.name: tt_insurance_during_construction_cost
tooltips.title: Insurance during Construction
tooltips.tip: Insurance policies held by owner during construction period, can include construction all risk, marine cargo, commercial general liability, workers compensation, environmental site liability, pollution liability, etc. Does not include insurance held by contractors.

tooltips.name: tt_maintenance_reserve_account_cost
tooltips.title: Maintenance Reserve Account
tooltips.tip: Payments (before commissioning) into reserve accounts set up to cover major maintenance expenditures (MRAs), often required by debt service providers.

tooltips.name: tt_debt_service_reserve_account_cost
tooltips.title: Debt Service Reserve Account
tooltips.tip: Payments (before commissioning) into reserve accounts set up to cover debt service expenditures (DSRAs), often required by debt service providers.

tooltips.name: tt_decommissioning_reserve_account_cost
tooltips.title: Decommissioning Reserve Account
tooltips.tip: Payments (before commissioning) into reserve accounts to fund project decommissioning obligations (e.g. security bonds).

tooltips.name: tt_other_reserve_accounts_cost
tooltips.title: Other Reserve Accounts
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the other reserve accounts costs category.

tooltips.name: tt_other_financial_costs_cost
tooltips.title: Other Financial Costs
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the financial categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_environmental_health_and_safety_monitoring_operations_cost
tooltips.title: Environmental Health and Safety Monitoring Operations
tooltips.tip: Coordination and monitoring to ensure compliance with health, safety, and environmental (HSE) requirements during construction.

tooltips.name: tt_annual_leases_fees_cost
tooltips.title: Annual Leases, Fees, Cost
tooltips.tip: Ongoing payments after COD, including but not limited to: payments to regulatory body for permission to operate at project site (terms defined within lease); payments to Transmissions Systems Operators or Transmission Asset Owners for rights to transport generated power.

tooltips.name: tt_insurance_operations_cost
tooltips.title: Insurance
tooltips.tip: Insurance policies held by project company or operations manager during operational period.

tooltips.name: tt_operations_management_and_general_admin_cost
tooltips.title: Operations, Management, and General Admin.
tooltips.tip: Activities necessary to forecast, dispatch, sell, and manage the production of power from the plant.  Includes both on-site and off-site personnel salaries, software, and equipment to coordinate high voltage equipment, switching, port activities, marine activities, weather forecasting.

tooltips.name: tt_other_operations_cost
tooltips.title: Other Operations
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the operations categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.

tooltips.name: tt_long_term_service_agreement_cost
tooltips.title: Long Term Service Agreement
tooltips.tip: Annualized cost of a contract, generally between the owner and marine energy converter OEM or Third Party, to maintain the water power project at a guaranteed level of availability for a defined period, will likely replace scheduled and unscheduled maintenance categories below for duration of contract

tooltips.name: tt_scheduled_maintenance_cost
tooltips.title: Scheduled Maintenance
tooltips.tip: Planned and routine activities to ensure that marine energy converters, substructures, and all related systems are operating correctly, at optimal efficiency, and to minimize unscheduled breakdowns/downtime, includes cost of vessels, labor, equipment, spare parts and consumables. Sometimes referred to as preventative maintenance.

tooltips.name: tt_unscheduled_maintenance_cost
tooltips.title: Unscheduled Maintenance
tooltips.tip: Interventions and other activities to respond to random failures. Costs include equipment and  vessels, labor, replacement parts, and consumables. Also known as corrective maintenance.

tooltips.name: tt_other_maintenance_cost
tooltips.title: Other Maintenance
tooltips.tip: Costs not included within the maintenance categories. Please provide a  description of the other cost input.
